comments.author: serveracim@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; tr; rv:1.8) Gecko/20060123 Pardus Firefox/1.5
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; tr; rv:1.8) Gecko/20060123 Pardus Firefox/1.5

When I click this URL, it doesn't be opened. It opens this URL only with Microsoft Internet Explorer.

http://hometr.cd.citibank.com.tr/HomeBankingSec/StartSession.asp?LANGNAME=Turkish&LANG=11&DEVICEMODE=HTMLGPH&SRCT=10&BUSCODE=tr&SERVICECODE=SIGNON&MODE=2

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.I open this URL first. http://www.citibank.com.tr/homepage/tr/index.htm#
2.Then I click (giris, bireysel bankacilik, Citibank Online)
3.I click Citibank Online. Then I click to "Citibank Online'a girmek icin tiklayin. Its URL is http://hometr.cd.citibank.com.tr/HomeBankingSec/StartSession.asp?LANGNAME=Turkish&LANG=11&DEVICEMODE=HTMLGPH&SRCT=10&BUSCODE=tr&SERVICECODE=SIGNON&MODE=2
4. But, it does not to be opened. I works only with Microsoft Internet Explorer.

Actual Results:  
The new window does'nt be opened.

Expected Results:  
Does nothing.

comments.author: steveh77@alum.mit.edu
comments.raw_text:
I am using MSXP

I can not use the URL www.citibank.com
It opens, but there is no action taken when I click on the selection lists or any of the links on the page.
Firefox is completely non-functional on this url.  If you want to know why I can't use Firefox, this is one good reason.  www.citibank.com is an absolutely critical www site to have work.

The following www.citibank.com signin URL is completely nonfunctional: nothing happens:

https://web.da-us.citibank.com/cgi-bin/citifi/scripts/login2/login.jsp?M=S

comments.author: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
This bug was originally reported on Firefox 2.x or older, which is no longer supported and will not be receiving any more updates. I strongly suggest that you update to Firefox 3.6.6 or later, update your plugins (flash, adobe, etc.), and retest in a new profile. If you still see the issue with the updated Firefox, please post here. Otherwise, please close as RESOLVED > WORKSFORME
http://www.mozilla.com
http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Managing+profiles
http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Safe+mode
